# MKLookAroundBadgePosition.topLeading

**Case**

The value that indicates the top-left badge position.

## Declaration

```swift
case topLeading
```

## Badge positions

- **MKLookAroundBadgePosition.bottomTrailing**: The value that indicates the bottom-right badge position.
- **MKLookAroundBadgePosition.topTrailing**: The value that indicates the top-right badge position.
